page.title: 10HOUSING. HOLT. WORCS.
page.content: The main concentration of housing at Holt Heath is currently being swelled by the building of l6 new houses and bungalows on a two acre site, at prices between Â£65,000 and Â£90,000 each. Housing generally is expensive due to the easy access to the motorway network and to nearby towns. Some housing lies around Holt Bridge and is varied is age and style A number of caravans along the banks of the Severn are used as permanent homes. At Dough Bank most chalets are now permanent homes having been brought up to modern standards.
